properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 3:03AM CST until February 16 at 7:30AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Alabama River At Selma Affecting Dallas County.

.Heavy rainfall over the past 24 hours has led to rises along the
Alabama River. A flood warning is now in effect for the Alabama
River at Selma.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Alabama River At Selma.
* from Thursday afternoon to Sunday morning...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At  2:00 AM Tuesday The stage Was 42.0 feet.
* Flood stage is 45.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...rise above flood stage by Thursday afternoon and
continue to rise to near 45.9 feet by Friday evening. The river
will fall below flood stage by Saturday evening.
* Impact...At 45.0 feet...Extensive overflow of low lying lands in the
area begins. Some low roads in the area begin to flood.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Tuesday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
